Public goods, Vitamin C serum with hyalauronic acid

Brand: Public Goods

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: water, glycerin, propanediol, terminalia ferdinandiana fruit extract, xanthan gum, opuntia vulgaris leaf extract, sodium hyaluronate, tetrasodium glutamate diacetate, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, ethylhexylglycerin, hexylene glyco
book: 2225-Public goods, Vitamin C serum with hyalauronic acid

chunk:
erin, hexylene glycol, citric acid.

Directions: After cleansing, apply a few drops of serum into hands or directly onto face. Gently pat and press onto skin. Allow the serum to fully absorb into skin before moisturizing.

Caution: Avoid getting product into the eyes, nose, mouth, or broken skin. Discontinue use if irritation or sensitivity occurs.
book: 2225-Public goods, Vitamin C serum with hyalauronic acid

sensitivity occurs.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
